title: 275. Professor Hendryx vs. Big Coal
description: What happens when a public-health researcher deep in coal country argues that mountaintop mining endangers the entire community? Hint: it doesn't go very well.
author: editor@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
